mapper.sql: id as id, user_name as userName, status as status, rank as rank, real_name as realName, nick_name as nickName, sex as sex, birthday as birthday, id_type as idType, id_card as idCard, avatar_url as avatarUrl, tel as tel, mobile as mobile, email as email, qq as qq, home_phone as homePhone, home_address as homeAddress, intro as intro, work_years as workYears, profession as profession, office_address as officeAddress, province_id as provinceId, city_id as cityId, district_id as districtId, reg_source as regSource, reg_ip as regIp, reg_time as regTime, reg_area as regArea, last_login_ip as lastLoginIp, last_login_time as lastLoginTime, last_login_area as lastLoginArea, mobile_verification as mobileVerification, email_verification as emailVerification, invite_code as inviteCode, inviter as inviter, is_agent as isAgent, memo as memo, dstatus as dstatus, creator as creator, createDate as createDate, lastModifier as lastModifier, lastModDate as lastModDate, version as version
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM uc_member WHERE id = #{id} for update

SELECT
FROM uc_member
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND user_name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.userName} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND rank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.rank} , '%')
AND real_name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.realName} , '%')
AND nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.nickName} , '%')
AND sex like CONCAT('%', #{condition.sex} , '%')
AND birthday like CONCAT('%', #{condition.birthday} , '%')
AND id_type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.idType} , '%')
AND id_card like CONCAT('%', #{condition.idCard} , '%')
AND avatar_url like CONCAT('%', #{condition.avatarUrl} , '%')
AND tel like CONCAT('%', #{condition.tel} , '%')
AND mobile like CONCAT('%', #{condition.mobile} , '%')
AND email like CONCAT('%', #{condition.email} , '%')
AND qq like CONCAT('%', #{condition.qq} , '%')
AND home_phone like CONCAT('%', #{condition.homePhone} , '%')
AND home_address like CONCAT('%', #{condition.homeAddress} , '%')
AND intro like CONCAT('%', #{condition.intro} , '%')
AND work_years like CONCAT('%', #{condition.workYears} , '%')
AND profession like CONCAT('%', #{condition.profession} , '%')
AND office_address like CONCAT('%', #{condition.officeAddress} , '%')
AND province_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.provinceId} , '%')
AND city_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cityId} , '%')
AND district_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.districtId} , '%')
AND reg_source like CONCAT('%', #{condition.regSource} , '%')
AND reg_ip like CONCAT('%', #{condition.regIp} , '%')
AND reg_time like CONCAT('%', #{condition.regTime} , '%')
AND reg_area like CONCAT('%', #{condition.regArea} , '%')
AND last_login_ip like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastLoginIp} , '%')
AND last_login_time like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastLoginTime} , '%')
AND last_login_area like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastLoginArea} , '%')
AND mobile_verification like CONCAT('%', #{condition.mobileVerification} , '%')
AND email_verification like CONCAT('%', #{condition.emailVerification} , '%')
AND invite_code like CONCAT('%', #{condition.inviteCode} , '%')
AND inviter like CONCAT('%', #{condition.inviter} , '%')
AND is_agent like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isAgent} , '%')
AND memo like CONCAT('%', #{condition.memo} , '%')
AND dstatus like CONCAT('%', #{condition.dstatus} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND version like CONCAT('%', #{condition.version} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
limit ${offset}, ${rows}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uc_member ( id, user_name, status, rank, real_name, nick_name, sex, birthday, id_type, id_card, avatar_url, tel, mobile, email, qq, home_phone, home_address, intro, work_years, profession, office_address, province_id, city_id, district_id, reg_source, reg_ip, reg_time, reg_area, last_login_ip, last_login_time, last_login_area, mobile_verification, email_verification, invite_code, inviter, is_agent, memo, dstatus, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, version ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userName}, #{status}, #{rank}, #{realName}, #{nickName}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{idType}, #{idCard}, #{avatarUrl}, #{tel}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{qq}, #{homePhone}, #{homeAddress}, #{intro}, #{workYears}, #{profession}, #{officeAddress}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{districtId}, #{regSource}, #{regIp}, #{regTime}, #{regArea}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{lastLoginArea}, #{mobileVerification}, #{emailVerification}, #{inviteCode}, #{inviter}, #{isAgent}, #{memo}, #{dstatus}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{version} )

INSERT INTO uc_member ( id, user_name, status, rank, real_name, nick_name, sex, birthday, id_type, id_card, avatar_url, tel, mobile, email, qq, home_phone, home_address, intro, work_years, profession, office_address, province_id, city_id, district_id, reg_source, reg_ip, reg_time, reg_area, last_login_ip, last_login_time, last_login_area, mobile_verification, email_verification, invite_code, inviter, is_agent, memo, dstatus, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, version ) VALUES ( #{item.id}, #{item.userName}, #{item.status}, #{item.rank}, #{item.realName}, #{item.nickName}, #{item.sex}, #{item.birthday}, #{item.idType}, #{item.idCard}, #{item.avatarUrl}, #{item.tel}, #{item.mobile}, #{item.email}, #{item.qq}, #{item.homePhone}, #{item.homeAddress}, #{item.intro}, #{item.workYears}, #{item.profession}, #{item.officeAddress}, #{item.provinceId}, #{item.cityId}, #{item.districtId}, #{item.regSource}, #{item.regIp}, #{item.regTime}, #{item.regArea}, #{item.lastLoginIp}, #{item.lastLoginTime}, #{item.lastLoginArea}, #{item.mobileVerification}, #{item.emailVerification}, #{item.inviteCode}, #{item.inviter}, #{item.isAgent}, #{item.memo}, #{item.dstatus}, #{item.creator}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.lastModifier}, #{item.lastModDate}, #{item.version} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE uc_member
user_name = #{userName},
status = #{status},
rank = #{rank},
real_name = #{realName},
nick_name = #{nickName},
sex = #{sex},
birthday = #{birthday},
id_type = #{idType},
id_card = #{idCard},
avatar_url = #{avatarUrl},
tel = #{tel},
mobile = #{mobile},
email = #{email},
qq = #{qq},
home_phone = #{homePhone},
home_address = #{homeAddress},
intro = #{intro},
work_years = #{workYears},
profession = #{profession},
office_address = #{officeAddress},
province_id = #{provinceId},
city_id = #{cityId},
district_id = #{districtId},
reg_source = #{regSource},
reg_ip = #{regIp},
reg_time = #{regTime},
reg_area = #{regArea},
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime},
last_login_area = #{lastLoginArea},
mobile_verification = #{mobileVerification},
email_verification = #{emailVerification},
invite_code = #{inviteCode},
inviter = #{inviter},
is_agent = #{isAgent},
memo = #{memo},
dstatus = #{dstatus},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
version = #{version},
WHERE id = #{id}
